Articles.Content:
This part (Solar Panels) is making an appearance in the pre-alpha gameplay. The solar panels is now in thei video.

 

Here is the time the part makes an apearence.

5:51

Edited October 5, 2020 by Dr. Kerbal
Not to kill your enthusiasm but in an early interview Nate Simpson said that they ported most of KSP1 parts just removing some that would be duplicates of some new features.
I really just want the community to know that the parts will come (cause some don’t get all KSP2 info like me) and to show them what it will look like.
Why are you making individual threads for each part? Just make 1 thread about all confirmed parts.,,
I’m not sure. Cause I want onto. Hmm. I’m not sure.
